attributes.action: HOLD A FULL INQUIRY INTO THE CONSERVATIVE GOVERNMENTS HANDLING OF THE NHS
attributes.background: This government has repeatedly misused data to mislead and scare the public.  Whilst wilfully avoiding contradictory evidence, this government has imposed a contract that will reduce doctor retainment and places staff and patients alike in danger . This abhorent behavior should not be tolerated.

rejection.details: It's not clear what kind of an inquiry you would like or what the scope of the inquiry should be. You could start a new petition asking clearly for what you would like to happen.
